WW_Relics:Power_Flaming.NAME: Flaming
DESCRIPTIONS: Your next Attack target this turn loses extra HP equals to the attack damage, then lose this buff.

WW_Relics:Power_Risky_Offensive.NAME: Risky Offensive
DESCRIPTIONS: This power is spent when you use a Skill card, making you lose #b

WW_Relics:Power_Potential.NAME: Potential
DESCRIPTIONS: Potential. Whole parts are spent to give the equivalent in Energy.

WW_Relics:Power_Weakest_Fighting_Style.NAME: Weakest Fighting Style
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, add a random #yWeakest card to your hand.
